players.name: Alice
memory:
You: "Charlie 
I suggest we watch Charlie closely. He seemed suspicious last night."
Bob: "I will keep an eye on Charlie"
You: "Let's all be cautious. Last night, Diana was found dead, and I suspect Charlie based on his behavior. We should watch him carefully to see if he shows any signs of guilt or involvement."
Charlie: "I will continue to monitor Charlie closely. Given Alice's suspicion and the circumstances, it would be wise for us all to remain vigilant."
Bob: "I will keep an eye on Charlie and stay cautious. Let's all work together to uncover the truth about Diana's death."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
